articles.title: SA records 2 894 new Covid-19 infections, 30 more deaths By IOL Reporter - IOL
articles.description: A total of 2 894 new Covid-19 cases and 30 Covid-19-related deaths were reported in South Africa on Sunday.
articles.content:
A total of 2894 new Covid-19 cases were reported in South Africa on Sunday.

articles.title: Elon Musk says he supports crypto in 'battle' over fiat money, like government-backed coins and bills - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: "The true battle is between fiat and crypto," Elon Musk tweeted on Saturday. "On balance, I support the latter."
articles.content:
Tesla CEO Elon Musk tweeted his support for crypto over fiat money on Saturday, with Bitcoin prices rising on the sentiment.

articles.title: Vodacom consortium wins Ethiopia operating licence - TechCentral
articles.description: Ethiopia has awarded a new telecommunications licence to a consortium including South Africa's Vodacom Group, paving the way for a long-awaited opening of the sector.
articles.content:
Ethiopia has awarded a new telecommunications licence to a consortium including South Africa’s Vodacom Group, paving the way for a long-awaited opening of the sector to outside investors.

articles.title: New photo shows oldest-ever spiral galaxy, and it formed around 1 billion years earlier than thought - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: The findings can provide clues on how spiral galaxies like the Milky Way have formed, a leading researcher told Insider.
articles.content:
Scientists have captured a picture of the oldest known spiral galaxy, which was formed 12.4 billion years ago.
